creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Amy Kasai
description: yellow band with slight incline stretching across bottom with white intaglio curving line and light grey shading at top; irregular brown, red, and green shape at lower center overlaps yellow form; waving pale pink figures across center; block of red at UL with slight incline, stretching across most of upper page punctuated by yellow splash-like form at upper center; teal colored block abuts red form and continues incline; small valley in teal pigment at base; rounded blue form with white circle overlaps green form at UR
signed: bottom margin, in pencil: [South Rikio Takahashi 1971]
title: South
